auth.signInDescription: Please sign in to access your teacher dashboard
auth.useGoogleAccount: Use your Google account to sign in
auth.secureLogin: Your login is secure and encrypted

dashboard.title: Assessment Dashboard
dashboard.mainDescription: Practical strategies to help children develop essential social and emotional learning skills

nameItToTameIt.title: Name it to tame it
nameItToTameIt.content: Studies show that when kids label their emotions, their stress levels drop and they calm down faster. Trying this can help with classroom behavior.

keepRoutinesPredictable.title: Keep routines predictable
keepRoutinesPredictable.content: Research suggests that consistent rituals, like morning greetings or end-of-day reflections, create safety and support SEL growth.

growTheirFeelingWords.title: Grow their feeling words
growTheirFeelingWords.content: Studies show that teaching one new emotion word at a time (like 'proud' or 'frustrated') improves children's self-control and communication.

checkInOneToOne.title: Check in one-to-one
checkInOneToOne.content: Research has found that short, personal check-ins build trust and make children feel seen. Even 2 minutes can matter.

chat.title: Ask Tilli
chat.subtitle: Ask me anything about your students
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. I can help you with questions about your students' assessments, provide insights on their progress, and suggest teaching strategies. What would you like to know?
chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask me about your students' assessments, progress, or teaching strategies...

responses.response1: Based on the assessment data, I can see that your Grade 3 students are showing strong improvement in self-awareness skills. The completion rate for Assessment 1 is 85%, which is above the target of 80%.
responses.response2: Looking at the data, I notice that students in the 'Growth' category have increased by 15% this month. This suggests your teaching strategies are working well. Consider focusing on the 'Beginner' students who might need additional support.
responses.response3: The assessment insights show that Self Management skills need more attention. Students in this category are showing slower progress compared to Self Awareness. I'd recommend incorporating more hands-on activities.
responses.response4: Your Grade 2 class has completed 90% of their pre-tests, which is excellent progress. The post-test is currently ongoing with 60% completion. The data suggests they're on track to meet learning objectives.
responses.response5: I can help you analyze the assessment patterns. Would you like me to generate a detailed report on specific areas where students are struggling, or would you prefer suggestions for improvement strategies?

data.overallDescription: See how the gist of assessment data
data.downloadDescription: Download CSV files containing student names, sections, assessment answers, overall scores, and SEL category scores. Parent questionnaire includes additional demographic and behavioral information.
data.selSkillCategories: See how your students are doing in the 8 SEL skill categories:

selfAwareness.title: Self Awareness
selfAwareness.description: Understanding one's emotions, strengths, and values.

selfManagement.title: Self Management
selfManagement.description: Managing emotions, behaviors, and goals effectively.

socialAwareness.title: Social Awareness
socialAwareness.description: Understanding and empathizing with others from diverse backgrounds.

relationshipSkills.title: Relationship Skills
relationshipSkills.description: Building and maintaining healthy, respectful connections with others.

responsibleDecisionMaking.title: Responsible Decision Making
responsibleDecisionMaking.description: Making thoughtful and ethical choices in everyday situations.

metacognition.title: Metacognition
metacognition.description: Thinking about one’s own thinking to improve learning and problem-solving.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: Recognizing and responding to the feelings and needs of others with care.

criticalThinking.title: Critical Thinking
criticalThinking.description: Analyzing and evaluating information to make sound judgments.

data.howCanIMakeItBetter: How can I make it better?
data.beginnerDescription: Students who are just starting to learn the concepts.
data.growthDescription: Students who are showing improvement and growth in their understanding.
data.expertDescription: Students who have demonstrated a strong grasp of the concepts and are excelling.

survey.title: Teacher Survey
survey.description: Teacher survey is a survey that is filled out by the teacher to evaluate the progress of their students in social and emotional learning skills.

sel_importance_belief.title: How strongly do your teachers believe that Social-Emotional Learning should be a regular part of their daily teaching and classroom practice?
sel_importance_belief.description: Measures teachers' belief in the importance of integrating SEL into everyday lessons.

sel_incorporation_frequency.title: How often have your teachers incorporated Social Emotional Learning in their teaching practices?
sel_incorporation_frequency.description: Tracks how frequently teachers weave SEL principles into classroom activities.

sel_confidence_level.title: How confident are your teachers in performing SEL in their classroom?
sel_confidence_level.description: Assesses teachers' comfort and self-assurance in leading SEL-based learning.

sel_performance_frequency.title: How often have your teachers performed SEL in their classrooms?
sel_performance_frequency.description: Reflects the regularity of actual SEL lessons or activities conducted by teachers.

disciplinary_issues_frequency.title: How often have you had to tackle disciplinary issues of children in your class? (in past 4 weeks from the date of administering the assessment)
disciplinary_issues_frequency.description: Indicates classroom behavioral challenges and the need for SEL-based interventions.

student_safety_respect_agreement.title: How strongly do the teachers agree that 'Students in my classroom feel safe and respected.' ?
student_safety_respect_agreement.description: Gauges perceptions of classroom climate and emotional safety for students.

student_self_awareness_management.title: To what extent are your students able to show self awareness and self management?
student_self_awareness_management.description: Captures teachers’ observations of students’ emotional regulation and reflection skills.

tilli_curriculum_confidence.title: How confident are your teachers to implement Tilli curriculum in their classrooms?
tilli_curriculum_confidence.description: Measures readiness and confidence to deliver the Tilli SEL program effectively.
